name: Buy/Sell
notes: Buy/sell instruments existing in the system
display_expr: str(selector_trade_type)+': '+format_number(transactions[0].position_size_with_sign, decimal_pos=2, thousand_sep=' ', use_grouping=True)+' of '+transactions[0].instrument.name+' Cash: '+format_number(transactions[0].cash_consideration, decimal_pos=2, thousand_sep=' ', use_grouping=True)+' '+transactions[0].settlement_currency.short_name+' to '+transactions[0].portfolio.user_code

inputs.name: fx_rate
inputs.verbose_name: FX Rate (Units of Settlement Сurrency per 1 Unit of Transaction Сurrency)
inputs.tooltip: FX Rate (Units of Settlement Сurrency per 1 Unit of Transaction Сurrency)
